# catalystcenter_integrate_ise (Resource)

This resource accepts the Cisco ISE server certificate for Cisco ISE integration

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "catalystcenter_integrate_ise" "example" {
  ise_instance_id = "0df326df-3609-417d-bbfc-fdffe125a172"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `ise_instance_id` (String) ISE instance UUID, obtained from the id of the catalystcenter_authentication_policy_server resource

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The id of the object
